outline.title: Blogs
outline.text: Blogs I personally like to read

outline.title: Victor's blog
outline.text: Victor is my dear friend with a lot of enthusiasm when it comes to deep diving into a topic.

outline.title: Eduardo's blog
outline.text: Bellani is someone I respect and trust to be interested into truth above all else.

outline.title: Lemos' blog
outline.text: Lemos is my dear recreative programming companion. We do suffer from the 'agree with you on over 90%' syndrome, however. Are we both insane?

outline.title: Diary of an Aesthete - Fabio Trombini
outline.text: Fabio is a sartorialist that gives me inspiration to live in an art deco era.
